note:
Associate prof Criminology Malmö Uni (Swe) & researcher Olso Uni (Nor). Studying geography of crime, gang violence and policing mainly.
Current research projects:
* Vulnerable neighborhoods in Norway
* Effects of police CCTV in Sweden
* What encrochat etc can tell us of OCG
* Effects of public housing investment on crime
* The geography of fear in urban and rural munis
* The implementation & effect of joint preventive efforts at open drug scenes
